sentences.sentence: I knew his opinion carried a lot of clout with them.
sentences.translation: 我知道他的观点对他们很有影响力。

sentences.sentence: Mr. Sutherland may have the clout needed to push the two trading giants into a deal.
sentences.translation: 萨瑟兰先生可能具有影响力来促使两大贸易巨头达成交易。

sentences.sentence: I was half tempted to give one of them a clout myself.
sentences.translation: 我几乎都想亲自去把他们当中的一个打一顿。
